properties.comment: this called the lamingo dam, jos south of Plateau state, Nigeria. This dam is the major source of water of the jos north and jos south of Plateau State, the waterboard which is a state government water supply body, uses this dam as a source of tap water to the entire jos north and jos south areas of the state , some residents boil the water before drinking. As a biologists i was able to confirm the presence of chlorine used by the ministry in treating the water before supply, this was confirmed when i used the water supply to keep clarias species (cat fish). none of them survived due to the chlorination of the water.
